42 #include "Teuchos_StandardParameterEntryValidators.hpp"
43 #include "Teuchos_as.hpp"
44 
45 
46 std::string Teuchos::getVerbosityLevelParameterValueName(
47  const EVerbosityLevel verbLevel
48  )
49 {
50  switch(verbLevel) {
51  case VERB_DEFAULT:
52  return "default";
53  case VERB_NONE:
54  return "none";
55  case VERB_LOW:
56  return "low";
57  case VERB_MEDIUM:
58  return "medium";
59  case VERB_HIGH:
60  return "high";
61  case VERB_EXTREME:
62  return "extreme";
63  default:
64  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT("Should never get here!");
65  }
66  return ""; // Never get here!
67 }
68 
69 
70 Teuchos::RCP<
71  Teuchos::StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<Teuchos::EVerbosityLevel>
72  >
73 Teuchos::verbosityLevelParameterEntryValidator(
74  std::string const& defaultParameterName
75  )
76 {
77  return rcp(
78  new StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<EVerbosityLevel>(
79  tuple<std::string>(
80  getVerbosityLevelParameterValueName(VERB_DEFAULT),
81  getVerbosityLevelParameterValueName(VERB_NONE),
82  getVerbosityLevelParameterValueName(VERB_LOW),
83  getVerbosityLevelParameterValueName(VERB_MEDIUM),
84  getVerbosityLevelParameterValueName(VERB_HIGH),
85  getVerbosityLevelParameterValueName(VERB_EXTREME)
86  ),
87  tuple<std::string>(
88  "Use level set in code",
89  "Produce no output",
90  "Produce minimal output",
91  "Produce a little more output",
92  "Produce a higher level of output",
93  "Produce the highest level of output"
94  ),
95  tuple<EVerbosityLevel>(
96  VERB_DEFAULT,
97  VERB_NONE,
98  VERB_LOW,
99  VERB_MEDIUM,
100  VERB_HIGH,
101  VERB_EXTREME
102  ),
103  defaultParameterName
104  )
105  );
106 }

120 AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator()
121  : preferredType_(PREFER_DOUBLE), acceptedTypes_(AcceptedTypes())
122 {
123  finishInitialization();
124 }
125 
126 
127 AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator(
128  EPreferredType const preferredType, AcceptedTypes const& acceptedTypes
129  )
130  : preferredType_(preferredType), acceptedTypes_(acceptedTypes)
131 {
132  finishInitialization();
133 }

136 // Local non-virtual validated lookup functions
137 
138 
139 int AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::getInt(
140  const ParameterEntry &entry, const std::string &paramName,
141  const std::string &sublistName, const bool activeQuery
142  ) const
143 {
144  const any &anyValue = entry.getAny(activeQuery);
145  if( acceptedTypes_.allowInt() && anyValue.type() == typeid(int) )
146  return any_cast<int>(anyValue);
147  if( acceptedTypes_.allowDouble() && anyValue.type() == typeid(double) )
148  return as<int>(any_cast<double>(anyValue));
149  if( acceptedTypes_.allowString() && anyValue.type() == typeid(std::string) )
150  return std::atoi(any_cast<std::string>(anyValue).c_str());
151  throwTypeError(entry,paramName,sublistName);
152  return 0; // Will never get here!
153 }
154 
155 
156 double AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::getDouble(
157  const ParameterEntry &entry, const std::string &paramName,
158  const std::string &sublistName, const bool activeQuery
159  ) const
160 {
161  const any &anyValue = entry.getAny(activeQuery);
162  if( acceptedTypes_.allowInt() && anyValue.type() == typeid(int) )
163  return as<double>(any_cast<int>(anyValue));
164  if( acceptedTypes_.allowDouble() && anyValue.type() == typeid(double) )
165  return any_cast<double>(anyValue);
166  if( acceptedTypes_.allowString() && anyValue.type() == typeid(std::string) )
167  return std::atof(any_cast<std::string>(anyValue).c_str());
168  throwTypeError(entry,paramName,sublistName);
169  return 0.0; // Will never get here!
170 }
171 
172 
173 std::string AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::getString(
174  const ParameterEntry &entry, const std::string &paramName,
175  const std::string &sublistName, const bool activeQuery
176  ) const
177 {
178  const any &anyValue = entry.getAny(activeQuery);
179  if( acceptedTypes_.allowInt() && anyValue.type() == typeid(int) )
180  return Utils::toString(any_cast<int>(anyValue));
181  if( acceptedTypes_.allowDouble() && anyValue.type() == typeid(double) )
182  return Utils::toString(any_cast<double>(anyValue));
183  if( acceptedTypes_.allowString() && anyValue.type() == typeid(std::string) )
184  return any_cast<std::string>(anyValue);
185  throwTypeError(entry,paramName,sublistName);
186  return ""; // Will never get here!
187 }
188 
189 
190 int AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::getInt(
191  ParameterList &paramList, const std::string &paramName,
192  const int defaultValue
193  ) const
194 {
195  const ParameterEntry *entry = paramList.getEntryPtr(paramName);
196  if(entry) return getInt(*entry,paramName,paramList.name(),true);
197  return paramList.get(paramName,defaultValue);
198 }
199 
200 
201 double AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::getDouble(
202  ParameterList &paramList, const std::string &paramName,
203  const double defaultValue
204  ) const
205 {
206  const ParameterEntry *entry = paramList.getEntryPtr(paramName);
207  if(entry) return getDouble(*entry,paramName,paramList.name(),true);
208  return paramList.get(paramName,defaultValue);
209 }

212 std::string AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::getString(
213  ParameterList &paramList, const std::string &paramName,
214  const std::string &defaultValue
215  ) const
216 {
217  const ParameterEntry *entry = paramList.getEntryPtr(paramName);
218  if(entry) return getString(*entry,paramName,paramList.name(),true);
219  return paramList.get(paramName,defaultValue);
220 }

272 
273 
274 void AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::validate(
275  ParameterEntry const& entry,
276  std::string const& paramName,
277  std::string const& sublistName
278  ) const
279 {
280  // Validate that the parameter exists and can be converted to a double.
281  // NOTE: Even if the target type will be an 'int', we don't know that here
282  // so it will be better to assert that a 'double' can be created. The type
283  // 'double' has a very large exponent range and, subject to digit
284  // truncation, a 'double' can represent every 'int' value.
285  getDouble(entry, paramName, sublistName, false);
286 }
287 
288 
289 void AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::validateAndModify(
290  std::string const& paramName,
291  std::string const& sublistName,
292  ParameterEntry * entry
293  ) const
294 {
295  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(0==entry);
296  switch(preferredType_) {
297  case PREFER_INT:
298  entry->setValue(
299  getInt(*entry,paramName,sublistName,false),
300  false // isDefault
301  );
302  break;
303  case PREFER_DOUBLE:
304  entry->setValue(
305  getDouble(*entry,paramName,sublistName,false),
306  false // isDefault
307  );
308  break;
309  case PREFER_STRING:
310  entry->setValue(
311  getString(*entry,paramName,sublistName,false),
312  false // isDefault
313  );
314  break;
315  default:
316  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT("Error, Invalid EPreferredType value!");
317  }
318 }
319 
320 
321 // private
322 
323 
324 void AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::finishInitialization()
325 {
326 
327  std::ostringstream oss;
328  bool addedType = false;
329  if(acceptedTypes_.allowInt()) {
330  oss << "\"int\"";
331  addedType = true;
332  }
333  if(acceptedTypes_.allowDouble()) {
334  if(addedType) oss << ", ";
335  oss << "\"double\"";
336  addedType = true;
337  }
338  if(acceptedTypes_.allowString()) {
339  if(addedType) oss << ", ";
340  oss << "\"string\"";
341  addedType = true;
342  }
343  acceptedTypesString_ = oss.str();
344 }
345 
346 
347 void AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::throwTypeError(
348  ParameterEntry const& entry,
349  std::string const& paramName,
350  std::string const& sublistName
351  ) const
352 {
353  const std::string &entryName = entry.getAny(false).typeName();
354  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PURE_MSG(
355  true, Exceptions::InvalidParameterType
356  ,"Error, the parameter {paramName=\""<<paramName<<"\""
357  ",type=\""<<entryName<<"\"}"
358  << "\nin the sublist \"" << sublistName << "\""
359  << "\nhas the wrong type."
360  << "\n\nThe accepted types are: " << acceptedTypesString_ << "!";
361  );
362 }

365 RCP<AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>
366  DummyObjectGetter<AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>::getDummyObject()
367 {
368  return anyNumberParameterEntryValidator(
369  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::PREFER_INT,
370  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::AcceptedTypes());
371 }

397 
398 
399 void FileNameValidator::validate(ParameterEntry const &entry, std::string const &paramName,
400  std::string const &sublistName) const
401 {
402  const std::string &entryName = entry.getAny(false).typeName();
403  any anyValue = entry.getAny(true);
404  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!(anyValue.type() == typeid(std::string) ),
405  Exceptions::InvalidParameterType,
406  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
407  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
408  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
409  "Error: The value that you entered was the wrong type." << std::endl <<
410  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
411  "Type specified: " << entryName << std::endl <<
412  "Type accepted: " << typeid(std::string).name() <<
413  std::endl << std::endl);
414  if(mustAlreadyExist_){
415  std::string fileName = getValue<std::string>(entry);
416  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!std::ifstream(fileName.c_str()),
417  Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue,
418  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
419  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
420  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
421  "Error: The file must already exists. The value you entered does " <<
422  "not corresspond to an existing file name." << std::endl <<
423  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
424  "File name specified: " << fileName << std::endl << std::endl);
425  }
426 }
427

460 ParameterEntryValidator::ValidStringsList

464  return validStrings_;

467 
468 ParameterEntryValidator::ValidStringsList
469 StringValidator::validStringValues() const
470 {
471  return validStrings_;
472 }
473 
474 
475 void StringValidator::validate(
476  ParameterEntry const &entry, std::string const &paramName,
477  std::string const &sublistName) const
478 {
479  any anyValue = entry.getAny(true);
480  const std::string &entryName = entry.getAny(false).typeName();
481  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!(anyValue.type() == typeid(std::string)) ,
482  Exceptions::InvalidParameterType,
483  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
484  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
485  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
486  "Error: The value that you entered was the wrong type." <<
487  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
488  "Type specified: " << entryName << std::endl <<
489  "Type accepted: " << Teuchos::TypeNameTraits<std::string>::name() <<
490  std::endl);
491  if(!validStrings_.is_null()){
492  Array<std::string>::const_iterator
493  it = std::find(validStrings_->begin(),
494  validStrings_->end(), getValue<std::string>(entry));
495  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(it == validStrings_->end(),
496  Exceptions::InvalidParameterValue,
497  "The \"" << paramName << "\"" <<
498  " parameter in the \"" << sublistName <<
499  "\" sublist is has an error." << std::endl << std::endl <<
500  "Error: The value that was entered doesn't fall with in "
501  "the range set by the validator." <<
502  "Parameter: " << paramName << std::endl <<
503  "Acceptable Values: " << *validStrings_ << std::endl <<
504  "Value entered: " << getValue<std::string>(entry) << std::endl <<
505  std::endl);
506  }
507 }
508 
509 
510 const std::string StringValidator::getXMLTypeName() const
511 {
512  return "StringValidator";
513 }
514 
515 
516 void StringValidator::printDoc(std::string const &docString,
517  std::ostream &out) const
518 {
519  Teuchos::StrUtils::printLines(out,"# ",docString);
520  out << "# Validator Used: " << std::endl;
521  out << "# String Validator" << std::endl;
522  if (validStrings_.get() && validStrings_->size()){
523  out << "# Acceptable Values: " << *validStrings_ << std::endl;
524  }
525 }

545 
546 Teuchos::RCP<Teuchos::AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>
547 Teuchos::anyNumberParameterEntryValidator(
548  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::EPreferredType const preferredType,
549  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::AcceptedTypes const& acceptedTypes

558 
559 void Teuchos::setIntParameter(
560  std::string const& paramName,
561  int const value, std::string const& docString,
562  ParameterList *paramList,
563  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::AcceptedTypes const& acceptedTypes
564  )
565 {
566  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(0==paramList);
567  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> paramEntryValidator =
568  anyNumberParameterEntryValidator(
569  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::PREFER_INT, acceptedTypes
570  );
571  paramList->set(paramName, value, docString, paramEntryValidator);
572 }

575 void Teuchos::setDoubleParameter(
576  std::string const& paramName,
577  double const& value, std::string const& docString,
578  ParameterList *paramList,
579  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::AcceptedTypes const& acceptedTypes
580  )
581 {
582  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(0==paramList);
583  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> paramEntryValidator =
584  anyNumberParameterEntryValidator(
585  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::PREFER_DOUBLE, acceptedTypes
586  );
587  paramList->set(paramName, value, docString, paramEntryValidator);
588 }

591 void Teuchos::setNumericStringParameter(
592  std::string const& paramName,
593  std::string const& value, std::string const& docString,
594  ParameterList *paramList,
595  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::AcceptedTypes const& acceptedTypes
596  )
597 {
598  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(0==paramList);
599  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> paramEntryValidator =
600  anyNumberParameterEntryValidator(
601  AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator::PREFER_STRING, acceptedTypes
602  );
603  paramList->set(paramName, value, docString, paramEntryValidator);
604 }
605 
606 
607 int Teuchos::getIntParameter(
608  ParameterList const& paramList,
609  std::string const& paramName
610  )
611 {
612  const ParameterEntry &entry = paramList.getEntry(paramName);
613  RCP<const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>
614  anyNumValidator = rcp_dynamic_cast<const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>(
615  entry.validator()
616  );
617  if ( !is_null(anyNumValidator) )
618  return anyNumValidator->getInt(entry,paramName,paramList.name());
619  if ( typeid(int) == entry.getAny().type() )
620  return any_cast<int>(entry.getAny());
621  // Try the do the conversion which might fail!
622  const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator myAnyNumValidator;
623  return myAnyNumValidator.getInt(entry,paramName,paramList.name());
624 }
625 
626 
627 double Teuchos::getDoubleParameter(
628  ParameterList const& paramList,
629  std::string const& paramName
630  )
631 {
632  const ParameterEntry &entry = paramList.getEntry(paramName);
633  RCP<const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>
634  anyNumValidator = rcp_dynamic_cast<const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>(
635  entry.validator()
636  );
637  if ( !is_null(anyNumValidator) )
638  return anyNumValidator->getDouble(entry,paramName,paramList.name());
639  if ( typeid(double) == entry.getAny().type() )
640  return any_cast<double>(entry.getAny());
641  // Try the do the conversion which might fail!
642  const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator myAnyNumValidator;
643  return myAnyNumValidator.getDouble(entry,paramName,paramList.name());
644 }
645 
646 
647 std::string Teuchos::getNumericStringParameter(
648  ParameterList const& paramList,
649  std::string const& paramName
650  )
651 {
652  const ParameterEntry &entry = paramList.getEntry(paramName);
653  RCP<const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>
654  anyNumValidator = rcp_dynamic_cast<const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator>(
655  entry.validator()
656  );
657  if ( !is_null(anyNumValidator) )
658  return anyNumValidator->getString(entry,paramName,paramList.name());
659  if ( typeid(std::string) == entry.getAny().type() )
660  return any_cast<std::string>(entry.getAny());
661  // Try the do the conversion which might fail!
662  const AnyNumberParameterEntryValidator myAnyNumValidator;
663  return myAnyNumValidator.getString(entry,paramName,paramList.name());
664 }
